sentences.english: An eye for eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
sentences.chinese: 以眼还眼只会让世界最终盲目。

sentences.english: An eye for an eye makes us all blind.
sentences.chinese: 以眼还眼会使我们完全盲目。

sentences.english: What he wants is an eye for an eys .
sentences.chinese: 他所需要的是以眼还眼。
